name: Measuring Eternity
description:
A poem from internationally best selling author David Jones, owner of the storydj instagram writing account followed by over 280,000 readers. The poem tells a story of lost love amongst the infinite cosmos and asks how we measure time in the face of eternity. My writing explores the links between the vastness of the universe and our personal, all too humans. We can find ourselves in the infinite.

All images are archived representations of space, planets and the stars, evoking a nostalgic feel.

Poem reads:

Measuring Eternity

And in
All of space,
All of time,
All of reality,

I wonder
How many lives
I'll have to live,

Until I find
My way back

To you.
